articles.author: Joe Sutton,Holly Yan
articles.title: The prime suspect in the disappearance of Natalee Holloway in Aruba will be extradited to the US - CNN
articles.description: The prime suspect in the 2005 disappearance of the late American teen Natalee Holloway will be extradited to the US to face extortion and fraud charges, said officials in Peru, where Joran van der Sloot has been serving time for the murder of a Peruvian woman.
